name: Euro Star

reviews.text: Not really hotel - more a guesthouse located by the Termini station, making getting around very easy. Arrived around midnight - girl on the reception spoke no English, but despite that everything went quickly and smoothly. Rooms are nice, quite spacious, interor decoration is simple, but beautiful, with some chinese hints. Where is a noisy street outside, so sleep quality was not the best. Once had to make an international call from the reception and they did not charge me anything for 10 min. conversation - that was nice from their side. Good choice if you arriving Rome late or leaving early.
reviews.title: Helpful staff

reviews.text: This was not what I was expecting, location was ok to the train station making departure easy but a little bit of a distance from Old Rome but taking the Metro did make it easy for me.
reviews.title: Debatable

description: Euro Star guest house is a new elegant guest house, located in Rome near main railway station TERMINI. The guest house has been furnished according to super-tree-stars standard, with many optional and modern devices, comfortable and bright rooms, elegant environment; all rooms have bathroom, heating, air conditioning, satellite-television and internet connection.
